text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActConsentType

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActConsentType

name: ActConsentType
title: ActConsentType
description: **Definition:** The type of consent directive, e.g., to consent or dissent to collect, access, or use in specific ways within an EHRS or for health information exchange; or to disclose health information for purposes such as research.
